channel.title: Add new status check to whonixcheck
channel.description:
Please add the status text for bridges in whonixcheck (where it shows updates and software checks), sometimes when changing the torrc people will accidentally or temporarily change up bridge options and might forget to enable or disable it:
Using a bridge: YES/NO (bridge type)
Example:
Using a bridge: Yes (OBFS3)

item.title: Add new status check to whonixcheck
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Thanks for the suggestion.

Patches welcome.

( https://www.whonix.org/wiki/FAQ#Patches_Welcome )

Read full topic
item.source: Add new status check to whonixcheck
